author: mmusich
body:
fixes https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/24

#### PR description:

Modernize `RecoVertex/BeamSpotProducer`:
   * merge headers with plugin implementation
   * transformed legacy `EDAnalyzer`s into `edm::one::EDAnalyzer`s
   * move `cout` to thread-safe `MessageLogger` instructions
   * remove commented out code
   * add `fillDescriptions` methods  

#### PR validation:

It compiles, also tested with unit tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: modernize `RecoVertex/BeamSpotProducer`
